name: FS22 Sand and Gravel Plant TERRA FARM Edition.
name_original: FS22 Sand and Gravel Plant TERRA FARM Edition.
description: YOU NEED TERRA FARM MOD FOR THIS TO WORK.Dirt go in and gravel and sand is the output. Pull your bucket or trailer at the end of one or the other conveyour is a fillpoint will pop up. It will work on any map as long as you HAVE TERRA FARM MOD.
